A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unfortunately you can see Disney’s hand all over this script. The story is a little too cutesy with an overabundance of slapstick and “jokes” that seem crammed into the story to lighten the mood. And the mood does need lightening as our heroes are pummeled to the Nth degree. The movie has almost none of the charm or character of previous installments and is sadly a poor continuation of The Force Awakens\, which felt like a genuine next step in the Star Wars story.
